thread.section_title: Hotel D'albion - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Decent hotel
thread.title_full: Decent hotel - Review of Hotel D'albion, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mette C
title: Decent hotel
text: This hotel was very good. Clean and comfortable. Very nice bathroom. Free Wifi, which worked well. Walking distance to Champs-Elys√©es (5 mins) and most other attractions in Paris. Metro close by if you want to explore more of the city. Staff were a bit cold, but we did not need much help so it was not a big problem. Nice restaurants and bakeries close by.
